about_the_game:
Our home planet is under threat from the dark Empire! Quickly climb into your spaceship of choice and taxi onto the tarmac with up to four friends to stand up to the enemy cruisers. Once in space, you have to dodge enemy fire and place tactically clever hits yourself. For example, you can disable the engines and attack each weapon system individually, forcing the enemy to change their tactics!

In addition to your friends, your Twitch chat is also present and can support you as a planetary council with new upgrades. New subscribers become part of the game themselves and ascend into the sky as wingmen to prevent the Empire from destroying the planet.
